channel.title: Mining procedure help needed
channel.description:
Hello everybody, Iam bussy with making my first own mining script. My drop ore procedure is already good enough, but i have some trouble with my mining procedure...:
Procedure minerocks; Begin if Findcolor(x,y,1845058,5,5,515,340) (i1845058 ron ore color rock) then MoveMouseSmooth(x,y) wait(200) clickMouse(x,y,true) wait(4500) if Findcolor(x,y,3684413,5,5,515,340) (empty rock color) then MoveMouseSmooth(x,y) wait (2000) end;
First problem was, scar was clicking on empty rocks, thats was fixed after I added an empty rock color. Iam mining in the dwarf mines, and the problem is. The dwarfes have the same color as my iron rock and the empty rock color is the same as the rats running there. Sometimes dwarfes will be clicked and thats not what i want, I only want to click the iron rocks when they contain iron ore. Plz give me some advise..
Bonoon

item.title: Mining procedure help needed
item.dc:creator: @bonoon bonoon
item.description:
@bonoon wrote:

Thank your very much for replying. This is the information i need to make this script working!

Read full topic

item.title: Mining procedure help needed
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

when you get SRL, the procedure is ‘DropAll’

and SRL stands for ‘Scar Recource Library’

Read full topic

item.title: Mining procedure help needed
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Use SRL, … forgot what it stands for.

Basically its an include will loads of procedures that will make things short for you.
all you need to do is download SRL and put it in you includes folder.

In the first line of your script add:
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

Simply browse through the SRL procedures and find the best suited one.
In this case there is a procedure that will check when you have the mouse over a rock if it says in the top left “mine rocks” that way you know your mining a rock and not a dwarf. Im sorry i was too breif but i fealt i could at least give you an idea where to go.
SRL is somthing like www.villu-reborn.com.

Read full topic

item.title: Mining procedure help needed
item.dc:creator: @bonoon bonoon
item.description:
@bonoon wrote:

Hello everybody, Iam bussy with making my first own mining script. My drop ore procedure is already good enough, but i have some trouble with my mining procedure…:

Procedure minerocks;
Begin
if
Findcolor(x,y,1845058,5,5,515,340) (i1845058 ron ore color rock)
then
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y)
wait(200)
clickMouse(x,y,true)
wait(4500)
if
Findcolor(x,y,3684413,5,5,515,340) (empty rock color)
then
MoveMouseSmooth(x,y)
wait (2000)
end;

First problem was, scar was clicking on empty rocks, thats was fixed after I added an empty rock color. Iam mining in the dwarf mines, and the problem is. The dwarfes have the same color as my iron rock and the empty rock color is the same as the rats running there. Sometimes dwarfes will be clicked and thats not what i want, I only want to click the iron rocks when they contain iron ore. Plz give me some advise…

Bonoon

Read full topic
